content:
Hello, I hope you are well. I had some personal issues going on last week and completely mixed up the date that the PSET 3 checkoff was due. Would it be possible for me to do that this week for even partial credit? I can get a note from s3 if needed, I have been working closely with one of the dean's and with VPR, who can also vouch for my missing assignment. I am very sorry for the late email, I just realized that the due date was not this Thursday.

I was also wondering if you had any recommendations for extra study materials, especially regarding classes and dictionaries, as I have somewhat fallen behind in class. I really enjoy the material and the PSETs, so I want to make sure that I am putting my best foot forward. I have also unfortunately missed a few finger exercises, as this semester has been extremely personally challenging, and I apologize for that as well.

My email is herose@mit.edu if it is better/easier to reply there.

Thank you for all of your help,

Hannah E. Rose

(I was unsure of who to send this question to, I apologize)
subject: Checkoff Makeup

content:
With s3 support, we can allow you to get the checkoff done by end of OH today. please cc me on an email anabell@mit.edu once you contact s3 (and cc your contact too).  

In terms of extra practice, you can look through the MITx materials linked from our Help tab on the website.
